name: XYZ (dishmoth)
description:
Death rewards every misjudged jump! Try to reach the end of a deadly obstacle course in this minimalist 3D platformer.

Move with W,A,S,D or the arrow keys, and jump with SPACE. Gamepads are also supported.

Jump like a pro: go higher and further by keeping the jump button held down, or get up some speed before jumping.

Don't give up, even if the challenge seems too great! You can always 'skip stage' through the pause menu (ESC key).
